definition: to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
erhua variant of 閃亮|闪亮[shan3 liang4]

sentences.english: An organic sculpture, covered with a shiny silver color, will be designed as a natural cave in the middle of the shop.
sentences.chinese: 閃亮耀目的銀面有機大造形在中廳創造出天然的洞。

sentences.english: This is I, glistens female student.
sentences.chinese: 這就是我，一個閃亮的女生。

sentences.english: Who do you think was the brightest star of the silver screen?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲誰是螢光幕前最閃亮的明星？

sentences.english: The stars that smile on their cottage send us the same twinkling look.
sentences.chinese: 在他們房上微笑的星辰，送給我們以同樣的閃亮。

sentences.english: Snowcapped mountain tops glisten in the strong Alpine sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 阿爾卑斯山的陽光讓山頭覆蓋的雪景，閃亮無比。

sentences.english: A little beyond an affluent, which was, probably, the Madeleine branch, he halted.
sentences.chinese: 大概是昂儒街的洞眼，射進了一道幾乎閃亮的光。

sentences.english: He pointed to a bright red sleekly gleaming Ferrari in the parking lot.
sentences.chinese: 他指着停車場上閃亮的，線條優美的紅色法拉利說道。

sentences.english: Beautiful twinkle of each little star.
Waxing quality of the corner area shall as same as the center area – brilliant and dazzling.
sentences.chinese: 牆角上蠟質量與地面中心位置一樣閃亮。

sentences.english: After the left-turn green arrow, a yellow arrow may appear.
sentences.chinese: 轉左帶綠色箭頭燈後，接着黃色箭頭燈會閃亮。

sentences.english: Candy makers use it to make those treats you love so much shiny and beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 糖果製造商用它令糖豆閃亮美麗，以取得你的喜愛。

sentences.english: It was made of tin and shone like a star.
sentences.chinese: 這朵花是由錫製成的，如星光一樣閃亮。

sentences.english: Let my love, like sunlight , surround you and yet give you illumined freedom.
sentences.chinese: 讓我的愛像陽光，環繞着你並賦予你閃亮的自由。

sentences.english: Miss Li,like a shining star,shines in my path of success.
sentences.chinese: 李老師，就像一顆閃亮的星照耀着我前進的道路。

sentences.english: Saturn still shines in the night though, farther eastward along the ecliptic plane.
sentences.chinese: 而沿着黃道平面朝更遠的東方，土星仍在夜空中閃亮。

sentences.english: Broad disks of iridescent brightness swam under his lids.
sentences.chinese: 閃亮的彩色光團在他的眼皮底下浮游。

definition: to illuminate/to turn on the lights/to light (a blaze)

to dodge/to duck out of the way/to beat it/shaken (by a fall)/to sprain/to pull a muscle/lightning/spark/a flash/to flash (across one's mind)/to leave behind/(Internet slang) (of a display of affection) "dazzlingly" saccharine
to stand out from the masses (idiom)
